data.title: Association of American Law Schools
data.meta_description: Founded in 1900, there are 175 law schools from across the country that are members of the Association of American Law Schools. Additionally, there are 19 fee-paid law schools. Below is a list of the member and fee-paid schools of The Association of American Law Schools. Clicking the links will take you to that school’s...
data.text:
Founded in 1900, there are 175 law schools from across the country that are members of the Association of American Law Schools. Additionally, there are 19 fee-paid law schools.

Below is a list of the member and fee-paid schools of The Association of American Law Schools. Clicking the links will take you to that school’s website. Learn more about membership requirements.

University of Akron School of Law (AALS, 1974)

The University of Alabama School of Law (AALS, 1928)

Albany Law School (AALS, 1947)
